meanings.sent1: The fibular bone helps in supporting the leg.
meanings.sent2: She felt a sharp pain in her fibular bone after the fall.
meanings.sent3: The fibular bone decided to take a break from all the walking.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as strong as a fibular bone.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained the importance of the fibular bone with a model.

meanings.definition: Located on the outer side of the leg.
meanings.sent1: Her fibular ankle was sprained during the hike.
meanings.sent2: The fibular muscles provide stability to the leg.
meanings.sent3: The fibular side of the leg got sunburned at the beach.
meanings.sent4: The tree's roots spread out like fibular branches.
meanings.sent5: He painted a picture of the fibular landscape in vivid colors.
